text:
Arturo Fernández Rodríguez (21 February 1929 – 4 July 2019) was a Spanish actor. He appeared in many stage performances and movies from 1954 until his retirement in April 2019. He was born in Gijón, Asturias, Spain. His best known works include "Red Cross Girls", "College Boarding House" and "The Locket".
Death.
Fernández Rodríguez underwent stomach surgery in April 2019. He recovered from the surgery, but shortly afterwards suffered a fall. His health never recovered and he died on 4 July 2019 at a hospital in Madrid from problems caused by the fall at the age of 90.
